arts.sum: In Serie A 2024/25, Atalanta recorded their biggest ever win at Juventus in the history of the 70 previous official matches (0-4), with goals from Retegui, Lookman, De Roon, and Zappacosta. There have been 70 previous official matches between the two teams in Turin, with Juventus winning 44, drawing 20, and Atalanta winning 6.

arts.sum: The Coppa Italia fixtures for the Round of 16 have been determined following the conclusion of Thursday’s action. Genoa beat Empoli 3-1 thanks to goals from Morten Frendup, Alessandro Marcandalli and Jeff Ekhator at the Luigi Ferraris. Torino also booked the spot after a narrow 1-0 victory over 10-man Pisa. arts.sum: Marco Palestra has made a strong immediate impact at Cagliari, earning a regular role from the get-go, turning heads for his dynamism, and providing his first assist of the season versus Lecce.
